pages.title: Ore Crushing Hammer
pages.text: This rather clumsy tool serves the only purpose to manually crush ores to grits (dusts), where the yield for one ore unit is two grit units.$(br)The heavy hammer head is made of bare iron, which is a cheap material, but also comes with the downside of low durability. Normally about one stack of ore can be processed before

the head is worn off. Building the head also requires quite a bit of iron.$(br2)Place the hammer and the ore into your crafting grid to manually crush that ore to dust.$(br2) $(br2)$(o)[Because this ore duplicating method is hard to automate, it is mainly interesting in early game stages, until an Ore Crusher machine is build.]$()
